summary: Removes the idle and draw/sheath sounds from all healing related restoration spells such as healing, fast healing, grand healing, heal other, and healing hands. Also turns down the volume of ward sound effects.
descriptionHtml: Removes the idle and draw/sheath sounds from all healing related restoration spells such as healing, fast healing, grand healing, heal other, and healing hands. Also turns down the volume of ward sound effects.
author: Clayvn
